select.if: SELECT * FROM mooneyes_order WHERE member_idx = #{member_idx} ORDER BY order_idx DESC LIMIT #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
SELECT * FROM mooneyes_order WHERE member_idx = #{member_idx} AND payment = #{payment} ORDER BY order_idx DESC LIMIT #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
